data.name: WAKFU - Beach Pack
data.detailed_description:
Be ready to face the World of Twelve with exclusive and powerful items! This pack will give you everything you need to enjoy fully the last update with new cosmetic items. THIS PACK IS AVAILABLE UNTILL THE NEXT UPDATE.

*Be careful, this DLC pack can be activated only once per player account in WAKFU.

The Beach Pack includes:

- 30 days of God Booster
• +30% XP points in combat and quests
• +10% chance to drop items at the end of combats
• +30% Kamas at the end of the combat
• Exclusive early access to latest areas and content
• Secondary characters get an XP bonus according to main character level
• Fill your health with one click
• Vote for governor’s elections
• 2 heroes for 30 days: Play with two additional characters from your account.

- Beachgoer Costume (a nice Bathing Suit!)
You've put on your swimsuit, so now all that's left is to jump in the water!

- Exceptional Artipotion
This potion increases the speed of crafting, planting and harvesting in all your professions by 100% (x2) for one hour.

data.short_description: The Beack Pack includes 30 days of God Booster, the Beachgoer Costume (bathing suit!) and an Exceptional Artipotion.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP SP3 or higher
  • Processor: Pentium IV 2.8 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 4Ti or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 1.3
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP SP3 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 6 series or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 1.3

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac 10.6
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA 950
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac 10.7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7 series or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
